# Mit Variablen rechnen

a<-2
b<-5
r1<- a+b
r2<- a-b
r3<- a*b
r4<- a/b

# Vektoren

v1<-c(r1,r2,r3,r4)
r5<-(a**b)
v1<-c(r1,r2,r3,r4,r5)
print(v1)
v2<-c("sum","difference","product","ratio","power")
print(v2)

# Datenrahmen

my_df<-data.frame(v1, v2)
my_df
my_df<- data.frame(Results = v1, Operation = v2)
my_df
my_df[3,1]
